EmailTemplate.name: 07-12-21 HOS Event The Forum Invitation.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the date: NCR service updates and Q&A—submit yours today
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Get recent service updates and metrics from the NCR Help Desk that support your restaurant The Forum is a monthly call where NCR representatives share information about recent service updates and help desk metrics from the previous month. And we’ll take questions from you, our iNCRedible customers, about support services for your account and answer them live. Join your NCR team, this Thursday, July 15, 2021 at 1:30 PM ET for an update. Agenda: - 1:30 p.m. to 1:50 p.m. Updates and Help Desk Metrics - 1:50 p.m. Q & A (Please submit your questions in advance to trenise.brunson@ncr.com) We look forward to sharing our updates with you on Thursday. Select the button below to add this event to your calendar today! ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
